column2: "Nna yɛdanee
column3: na yɛfowee kɔr Basan kwan do: na Basan hen Ɔge fiir edzi behyiaa hɛn

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Mma nnsuro no: na meyi ɔno
column6: ahyɛ wo nsa; na yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtsenaa Hesbon no."

column2: "Dɛmara na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yii Basanhen Ɔge so
column4: hyɛɛ hɛn nsa: na yekum no araa kodur dɛ woenngyaa biara mma wɔannka amma no."

column2: "Na yɛgyee no nkurow nyinara aber no mu; kurow biara nnyi hɔ a yɛanngye no hɔn hɔ; nkurow eduosia
"Iyinom nyinara yɛ nkurow a no ho wɔ afasu atsentsen
column4: nye adaban; ɔsor nkurow a ɔdɔɔ so piigyan a no ho nnyi afasu no."

column2: "Na yɛsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa
column3: dɛ mbrɛ yɛyɛɛ Hesbonhen Sihon no
column4: yɛsɛɛ kurow biara a nyimpa tse mu no pasapasa
column5: dze kaa mbaa nye mbofraba ho."

column2: "Na ofiembowa nyinara
column3: na nkurow no mu asadze no dze

column2: "Na yɛgyee asaase no wɔ Amorifo ahemfo beenu no a wɔwɔ Jordan egya no nsamu aber no mu
column3: fi Arnon ɔbɔn mu kodur bepɔw Hermon ho;"

column2: "(Hermon no Zidonfo frɛ no Sirion
"tɛtɛr mu nkurow nyinara
column6: Ɔge n'ahenman nkurow a ɔwɔ Basan."

column2: "(Na Basanhen Ɔge nko na ɔkae wɔ Refafo nkaa no mu; hwɛ
column3: nna ne mpadua ayɛ dadze mpadua; nnda ho nnsi Ammonmba Rabaa bi a? Ne tsentsen yɛ basafa anan nye fa

column2: "Na asaase yi na yɛfae wɔ aber no mu: ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn ho
column5: na medze maa Reubenfo nye Gadfo;"

column2: "na Gilead nkaa
column5: na medze memaa Manaasɛ ebusuakuw ɔfa no; Argob mbew nyinara
column6: mekyerɛ Basan nyinara. (Ɔnoara na wɔfrɛ no Refaim asaase no."

column2: "Manaasɛ ne babanyin Jair faa Argob mbew nyinara
"Na medze Gilead memaa Makir."
"Na Reubenfo nye Gadfo na medze ofi Gilead araa dze kodu Arnon ɔbɔn ho
column4: nye no ntoaado memaa hɔn; mekyerɛ dze kodu esutsen Jabbok a ɔyɛ Ammonmba ɔhe no do;"

column2: "Araba so
column4: ofi Kinneret araa dze kodu Araba epo ho
column6: wɔ Pisga ntserɛwee ase boka afamu."

column2: "Na mehyɛɛ hom aber no mu dɛ
column3: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze asaase yi ama hom dɛ hom mfa: hom mmia ntwa mu ndzi hom nuanom Israelmba enyim

column2: "Hom yernom
column4: nye hom fiembowa dze (minyim dɛ hom wɔ fiembowa piigyan) wɔntsena hom nkurow a medze mama hom no mu;"

column2: "nkodu dɛ EWURADZE bɛma hom nuanom ahomgye
column4: na hɔn so wɔaakɛfa asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hɔn wɔ Jordan egya no: n'ekyir no na hom mu nyimpa biara nsan mbra n'enyadze do
column5: dza medze mama hom no a."

column2: "Na mehyɛɛ Josua aber no mu dɛ
column3: W'enyiwa ehu dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze ayɛ ahemfo beenu yi nyinara:"

column2: "Mma hom nnsuro hɔn: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column3: ɔno nye nyia ɔroko ma hom."

column2: "Na meserɛɛ EWURADZE aber no mu dɛ
column5: ɔwo na ahyɛ ase dze wo kɛseyɛ
column6: nye wo nsa dzendzen no akyerɛ w'akowaa: na onyame bɛn na ɔwɔ ɔsor anaa asaase do a obotum ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ wo ndwuma

column2: "Mepa wo kyɛw
column4: na monkɔhwɛ asaase pa a ɔwɔ Jordan egya no

column2: "Na hom ntsi EWURADZE no bo fuuw me
column3: na oenntsie me: na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column4: Ma ɔndɔɔ wo so; mma nnye me nnkasa asɛm yi ho bio."

column2: "Fow kɔ Pisga etsifi
column3: na ma w'enyiwa do wɔ anee afamu
column5: nye pomu afamu nye boka afamu
column6: na fa w'enyiwa hwɛ; na ɔwo runntwa Jordan yi."

column2: "Mbom hyɛ Josua
column4: na hyɛ no dzen: na ɔno na obedzi ɔman yi enyim etwa
column5: na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ ma woeenya asaase a ibohu no edzi."

column2: "Nna yɛtsenaa ɔbɔn no mu wɔ Bɛt-peor tsentsendo."
